senses.sense_definition: Any item of false hair worn on the head or face, such as a false beard, mustache, or wig.

examples.text: The actor applied a <w>postiche</w> to his chin to transform into the elderly character.
She decided to wear a <w>postiche</w> to add volume and length to her hairstyle for the event.

senses.sense_definition: Describing ornamentation or details added to a work after it is essentially finished, often implying artificiality.

examples.text: The critic dismissed the building's details as <w>postiche</w> decorations that served no structural purpose.
He felt the final chapter was a <w>postiche</w> addition that did not fit the tone of the original novel.
